title: 10 year anniversary party
content: It's been 25 years since Place to Grow started welcoming international graduate students and postdoctoral fellows to its leafy brick residence â€“ a home-away-from-home on the UBC Vancouver campus. With the motto, "the world around our table," Place to Grow is home to 165 students from 40 countries.
